title: Bent's Old Fort National Historic Site: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Holiday Celebration    7 Photos  The Holiday Celebration is held the first weekend of December.  Traditional holiday activites of the time period such as Yule log hunt, taffy pulls, kid's games, wagon rides take place during the day.  Candle light tours are provided in the evenings by reservation only.            Kid's Quarters    5 Photos  Seven to eleven year olds are given a chance to work as a trader, trapper, craftsman, laborer or domestic in July.  Pre-registration is required.          Living History Encampment    11 Photos  The Living History Encampment provided educators, hobbyists, authors, and history enthusiasts a chance to learn, practice and work as a trader, trapper, craftsman, domestic, or laborer three days and nights.  The training has taken place every odd year in June.              National Park Service Centennial Photos   5 Photos  The National Park Service Centennial during 2016 is a celebration of what best represents the park's best features as shown in this gallery.
